title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2935/87 of 30 September 1987 fixing for the 1987/88 marketing year the minimum purchase price for oranges delivered for industrial processing and the financial compensation payable after processing
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2935/87
of 30 September 1987
fixing for the 1987/88 marketing year the minimum purchase price for oranges delivered for industrial processing and the financial compensation payable after processing
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. For the 1987/88 marketing year, the minimum prices to be paid to producers are hereby fixed at the levels set out below:
(a) for oranges of the Biondo commune variety:
(ECU/100 kg net)
1.2.3 //  //  //  // Spain   // Portugal   // Other Member States   //    //   //   // 9,89   // 7,62   // 11,20   // 334, 27. 11. 1986, p. 1.
(b) for blood oranges of the varieties:
(ECU/100 kg net)
1.2.3.4 //  //  //  //  //  // Spain   // Portugal   // Other Member States   //    //   //   //   // Moro, Tarocco and Sanguinello   // 13,12   // 10,11   // 14,86   // Sanguigno  // 10,21   // 7,88   // 11,57   //    //   //   //
2. These minimum prices shall be for goods ex-producers' packing stations.

For the 1987/88 marketing year, the financial compensation granted to processors is hereby fixed at the levels set out below:
(a) for oranges of the Biondo commune variety:
(ECU/100 kg net)
1.2.3 //  //  //  // Spain   // Portugal   // Other Member States   //    //   //   // 5,08   // 2,81   // 6,39   //  //   //
(b) for blood oranges of the varieties:
(ECU/100 kg net)
1.2.3.4 //  //  //  //  //  // Spain   // Portugal   // Other Member States   //    //   //   //   // Moro, Tarocco and Sanguinello   // 8,31   // 5,30   // 10,05   // Sanguigno  // 5,40   // 3,07   // 6,76   //    //   //   //
The amounts referred to in Articles 1 and 2 shall apply to oranges which satisfy at least the minimum quality and size requirements laid down for Class III.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 October 1987.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 September 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President  //   //
(1) OJ No L 324, 27. 12. 1969, p. 21. (2) OJ No L 103, 16. 4. 1984, p. 10. (3) OJ No L 183, 3. 7. 1987, p. 26. (4) OJ No L
